channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- SendPress Newsletters
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- SendPress Newsletters

item.title: CVE-2024-1588|2024-08-01T18:40:21.438Z -- unknown -- sendpress%20newsletters
item.description: The SendPress Newsletters WordPress plugin through 1.23.11.6 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)

item.title: CVE-2024-1589|2024-08-01T18:40:21.454Z -- unknown -- sendpress%20newsletters
